All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class MethodArgumentNotValidException
extends java.lang.Exception

Exception to be thrown when validation on an argument annotated with @Valid fails.

Since:
3.1
Author:
Rossen Stoyanchev
See Also:
